system.description:
You call upon magical trickery to create one of the following effects within range:

  • You change up to 100gp of coins into a different mix of coins of the same value. For example, you could turn 10 copper pieces into a silver piece or vice versa. This can never increase or decrease the value of the currency.

  • You cause an object no larger than the palm of your hand that you touch to teleport to one of your pockets or up your sleeve.

  • You create a simple repeating sound such as the sound of a metronome or a simple drumbeat. The sound repeats for up to 10 minutes.

  • You instantly end the effects of recreational intoxicants that you voluntarily consumed (such as alcohol) on yourself, sobering up immediately.

  • You perfume yourself with a scent of your choosing. The smell lasts for an hour or until you cast this spell again.

  • You change the color and/or pattern of a single article of clothing you are wearing to a different one. The change is permanent.
